# [Interview #75: ACOS Signing Report - Erica Sadun, Entry #22](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=75#22)

#### Question

Tell us about those Sea Folk rituals during the wedding...

#### Robert Jordan

How old are you?

#### Question

Over the age of consent.

#### Robert Jordan

You're too young!
